title: Nature Near Home and Other Papers
creator: John Burroughs
description: Librivox recording of Nature Near Home and Other Papers by John Burroughs. Read by Edith Phern. Nature Near Home is one of many books on natural history by John Burroughs. It is full of simple observations about rural scenes and charming stories about animals, plants, and even people! Burroughs loves the creatures around him and derives great pleasure from his walks and studies in nature’s scenes. (Summary by Edith Phern) For more free audiobooks, or to become a volunteer reader, please visit librivox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobooks; nature; nonfiction; essays; natural history; animals; plants
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
